name: Tri-Pool
overview:
Tri-Pool was produced by Noma in 1981.

There are three game to choose from: Straight Pool, Nine Ball, and Snooker.

You control a white dot with the joystick. Put the dot where you want to hit the ball and push the selected button. You can hit the cue ball at different speeds. You only receive 5 cue balls per game.
